description:
This episode of Meisaku is inspired by "Omocha No Cha-Cha-Cha (All the Children`s Toys Go Cha-Cha-Cha)." Toys started moving because of Mei`s supernatural powers?! But those toys are slightly outdated. Mei is voiced by Masaki Sato.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All the Children`s Toys Go Chitter-Chatter
おもちゃがワチャワチャ
